Body: Possible Duplicate:  How to share internet among 2 android devices?  Can we use an Android phone as a Wi-Fi repeater?  I have an android cell phone (Samsung Galaxy S Advance) running on Android 2.3.6. I am interested in converting my cell phone to a WiFi-Hotspot so that I can use the GPPRS/3G from my phone to access internet on other WiFi-enabled devices. Any android applications that might help to do this?
Title: How to make cell phone using GPRS/3G a WiFi-Hotspot
